description:
The secret is out!  The Pharaoh’s journey was more than a trip to the past – it’s the greatest Shadow Game ever created!  Yami Yugi and Yami Bakura’s Shadow Game has already reached apocalyptic proportions, but it’s only the beginning of cataclysmic events!   Aknadin has taken the form of the powerful Great Shadow Magus and embedded the seven Millennium Items into the sacred stone!  The countdown to Zorc’s resurrection – and the end of civilization – has started!
Source: crunchyroll
